Atụmatụ echekwa ezumike nka onye ọ bụla - PERIN
Ekele dịrị PER, jikere maka ezumike nka gị mgbe ị na-ebelata ụtụ isi gị:
Kedu ihe bụ PER ma ọ bụ a na-akpọkwa PERIN?
The PER, (Perin) Atụmatụ nchekwa ezumike nka onye ọ bụla, mkpụrụ nke iwu nkwekọrịta abanyela n'ike na October 1, 2019
Ọ na-anọchi Perp yana iwu Madelin.
Kedu ihe kpatara ị ga-eji wepụta nkwekọrịta nchekwa ego ezumike nka n'otu n'otu?

N'iburu na ezughi oke nke atụmatụ ezumike nka ịkwụ ụgwọ ị na-aga, atụmatụ ichekwa ego ezumike nka n'otu n'otu na-enye ụmụ amaala niile ohere, ma ị bụ ọrụ na-emesapụ aka, tns, onye njikwa ụlọ ọrụ ma ọ bụ onye ọrụ, ịchekwa yana wulite mgbakwunye ego
ma ọ bụ isi ego maka ezumike nka, site na ịkwụ ụgwọ oge nke ị nwere ike iwepụ na ego ị na-atụ ụtụ isi
Site n'otu n'otu na-ebelata ụtụ isi ego gị site na 45%.
N'isi obodo n'otu ụzọ, site na otu ịkwụ ụgwọ
Isi obodo na-apụ apụ na nkeji nkeji
Ụzọ ọpụpụ akụkụ na isi obodo ahụ ndị fọdụrụ na ndụ annuity
